docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: ''IT takes years to get skin cancer. Most of us get an early start.'' This is the message on two potentially life-saving posters being distributed by the Skin Cancer Foundation in an effort to halt a fast-growing health threat. The posters depict children playing on the beach, their tender skin exposed to the searing sun.
